data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Nord, Cameroon.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord, Cameroon
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 121,081 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Nord, Cameroon.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, make the church in Nord, Cameroon humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Nord, Cameroon.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Fulbe-Gey people. Make the Fulbe-Gey people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, help the 121,081 believers in Nord to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Nord, Cameroon.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 121,081 believers in the state of Nord to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

location.name: Nord
location.people_groups_list: Koma, Gimnime, Fali, South, Dowayayo, Gidar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Koma (61,000), Gimnime (8,400), Fali, South (59,000), Dowayayo (49,000), Gidar (159,000)
